document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Doncastle in the Dernall Forest.
document_data.name: Doncastle
document_data.mainbody: '''Doncastle''' was a small town located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Doncastle was situated within the folds of the [[Dernall Forest]] along the western bank of the [[Swanmay River]] in the county of [[Stagford]]. The town lay just east of the [[Drowned Forest]] at the end of a trail that branched off from the [[High King's Road]].
